    1. BistroServer(int, ServerController)

Class BistroServer

java.lang.Object
ocsf.server.AbstractServer
Server.BistroServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class BistroServer extends ocsf.server.AbstractServer
Main OCSF server of the Bistro system.

Responsibilities:

  • Starts/stops server and background jobs.
  • Receives client requests (as Envelope) and routes them by OpCode.
  • Performs business validations and calls DAO layer.
  • Sends responses back using KryoMessage serialization.
